## EthersKumo.getTroves() method

Get a slice from the list of Troves.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTroves(asset: string, params: TroveListingParams, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<UserTrove[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  asset | string |  |
|  params | [TroveListingParams](./lib-base.trovelistingparams.md) | Controls how the list is sorted, and where the slice begins and ends. |
|  overrides | [EthersCallOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherscalloverrides.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[UserTrove](./lib-base.usertrove.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

Pairs of owner addresses and their Troves.
